trans-unit.source: Recognizes ink gestures.
trans-unit.target: 잉크 제스처를 인식 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A GestureRecognizer identifies an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: GestureRecognizer 잉크 제스처를 식별합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can set the GestureRecognizer to recognize all or a subset of application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 전체 또는 응용 프로그램 제스처의 하위 집합 인식 하도록 GestureRecognizer를 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: To set the GestureRecognizer to recognize a subset of the available gestures, pass an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> array to the constructor or use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있는 제스처의 하위 집합을 인식 하도록 GestureRecognizer를 설정 하려면 전달는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>배열 생성자 나 사용에는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contains a gesture, call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 확인 하려면 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>는 제스처 호출 포함는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: # #에서이 클래스를 사용할 수 없습니다 XAML 텍스트 사용 하면 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When it is created with this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes all application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자를 사용 하 여 생성 될 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>모든 응용 프로그램 제스처를 인식 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the GestureRecognizer constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes a subset of the application gestures.
trans-unit.target: GestureRecognizer 생성자를 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>응용 프로그램 제스처의 일부만 인식 하는.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> will recognize.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> 응용 프로그램 제스처를 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> 인식 하 게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 모든 리소스를 해제는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you finish using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> 를 사용 하 여 완료 하면 Dispose를 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>불안정 한 상태가.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 Dispose를 호출한 후 해제 해야에 대 한 모든 참조는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>가비지 수집기는 메모리를 회수할 수 있도록 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>차지한.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> 에 대 한 마지막 참조를 해제 하기 전에 항상 호출 삭제

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 사용 중인 리소스가 가비지 수집기 호출할 때까지 해제 되지 것입니다 그렇지 않은 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>개체의 `Finalize` 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 제스처를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> 인식 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that contains gestures the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> is set to recognize.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> 제스처를 포함 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> 인식으로 설정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean that indicates whether the gesture recognizer is available on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: 제스처 인식기를 사용자의 시스템에서 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 부울 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>인식 구성 요소를 사용할 수 없는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Looks for gestures in the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 제스처를 찾습니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the Recognize method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 인식 메서드에 의해 반환 된 배열 정렬 기준으로 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, Recognize may return a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> array with the following values: |Index|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 인식 다음 값을 갖는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>배열을 반환할 수 있습니다. | 인덱스 | ApplicationGesture | RecognitionConfidence | |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |&0; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&1; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&2; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| |&3; | <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>| <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>| 즉는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>가능성이 매우 임을 인식 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>비교적 가능성이 확인 표시 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>하지 제스처 및 일 가능성이 전혀 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>소용돌이 또는 이중 소용돌이.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Recognize method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> at a higher <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 메서드는 인식 된 배열을 반환할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>높여서 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>다른 응용 프로그램 제스처 보다.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 가능성이 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>낮은 <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> 있는 제스처와 달리를 제스처 하지</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to search for gestures.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> </xref> 제스처를 검색할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"></xref> that contains application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognized.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult"> </xref> 응용 프로그램을 포함 하 되는 제스처는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> 인식 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the application gestures that the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램 제스처를 설정의 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> 인식 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"></xref> that specifies the application gestures you wish the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"></xref> to recognize.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 배열 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture"> </xref> 응용 프로그램 제스처를 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer"> </xref> 인식 하도록 합니다.
